article: One day a rich man wanted to sell some goods in another town and buy some things there. He  _  to take ten servants with him. They would carry the goods and also some  _  to eat on their way. The rich man said to  _  of his servants, "Ali, you are the  _  and the weakest one. You may  _  the lightest load to carry." Ali thanked him and chose the  _  load. It was their food-bread. The rich man said, "How foolish you are! That's the heaviest one. " But Ali was  _  to lift it up. And so they set off. Four hours  _  , they stopped for a rest. They all  _  some of the bread. Then there was  _  bread for Ali to carry. Each time they ate some, the load became smaller and lighter. At last the clever servant had nothing to carry.
